info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 1:25PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...RAIN CHANGEOVER TO A BRIEF PERIOD OF LIGHT SNOW... HAZARDS...Rain changing to light snow, accompanied by winds of up to 50 MPH. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...As of 115 PM EST, rain had changed to light to moderate snow across western New Jersey, Poconos and Catskills, with this transition moving northeast into the area at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Paterson, Elizabeth, Flatbush, New Rochelle, Flushing, Passaic, Bayonne, White Plains, Wayne, Mott Haven and Hoboken. SAFETY INFO...Temperature will quickly drop to freezing by 3pm and may cause black ice to form on elevated roadways, overpasses and bridges. Black ice is nearly impossible to see and roadways may appear only wet. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
